files.description: FastAPI server exposing endpoints to submit DOI lists, run open-full-text discovery against multiple providers, and return structured results with logs.

DIR_STATE:["src/api_server.py"]
SUMMARY: Implemented a FastAPI server with /runs submission and /runs/{run_id} retrieval that performs multi-provider open full-text discovery and persists structured results with logs under outputs/runs/.

files.description: Implements provider-ordered DOI-to-fulltext discovery (Unpaywall, OpenAlex, Crossref links, PubMed/PMC) with normalized result objects and retry/backoff.

missionDescription: Build a lightweight citation/primary-source access MVP prototype saved to /outputs (e.g., script that takes a DOI list and attempts to locate open full-text via known repositories/APIs, logging success/failure) to support goal_1.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
The system identified primary-source repositories as high-utility, but produced no tool or artifact; a minimal prototype converts that insight into reusable infrastructure.
